text: Jani Petteri Forsell (born 16 October 1990) is a Finnish footballer who plays for Polish club Stal Mielec. ==Career== After starting his career with the local KPV, Forsell was signed by a near Veikkausliiga side VPS in 2009. After struggling to make it in the match squads at Vaasa, he left after only one season, switching to a fellow Veikkausliiga side, IFK Mariehamn. At Mariehamn, he began appear more regularly and soon attracted the attention of much bigger clubs in and outside of Finland. On 9 August 2012 he was selected as the player of the month, for July.Petteri Forsell Veikkausliigan heinäkuun pelaaja (Petteri Forsell Veikkausliiga's player of the month for July) ; Veikkausliiga.com - 9.8.2012 On 5 August 2012, it was announced that Forsell had signed with Turkish top flight club Bursaspor.Petteri Forsellin Bursaspor- siirto varmistui (Petter Forsell's transfer to Bursaspor goes through); Ilta- Sanomat, 5.8.2012 He was handed the number #7 shirt, for the upcoming season. Forsell made his debut for Bursaspor as a substitute on 23 August in a Europa League qualifying match against FC Twente. Forsell was selected as the Ekstraklasa Player of the Month for September 2018. Forsell was the first ever player from Miedź Legnica to win the award and the first player to win it in his rookie year.Petteri Forsell Piłkarzem Września 2018; EkstraKlasa, 10.10.2018 On 10 August 2019, Forsell scored one and gave two assists in a 4–0 win against FC Lahti on his league debut for HJK. ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Finland's goal tally first. {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" |- !Goal!!Date!!Venue!!Opponent!!Score!!Result!!Competition |- | 1. || 6 February 2013 || Netanya Stadium, Netanya, Israel || || align=center | 1–1 || align=center | 1–2 || Friendly |} ==References== ==External links== * * * * * Petteri Forsell at 90minut.pl Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish footballers Category:Finnish expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Vaasan Palloseura players Category:IFK Mariehamn players Category:Bursaspor footballers Category:Miedź Legnica players Category:Korona Kielce players Category:Kokkolan Palloveikot players Category:Örebro SK players Category:Helsingin Jalkapalloklubi players Category:Veikkausliiga players Category:Allsvenskan players Category:Süper Lig players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:I liga players Category:People from Kokkola Category:Finland under-21 international footballers Category:Finland international footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:Expatriate footballers in Sweden Category:Expatriate footballers in Turkey Category:Finnish expatriate sportspeople in Poland Category:Finnish expatriate sportspeople in Sweden Category:Finnish expatriate sportspeople in Turkey
title: Petteri Forsell
